actions.Multiattack: The scorpion makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12+1d4 + 10). The scorpion has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
actions.Sting: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
